AccessRestrictedTryAgainLater: Access is currently restricted. Please try again later.
AllComplexFormats: Všetky komplexné formáty (ASS, SSA, VOBSUB, PGS, SUB/IDX, a pod.)
AllowSeasonalThemesHelp: If enabled, seasonal themes will occasionally override your theme setting.
AlwaysPlaySubtitlesHelp: Subtitles matching the language preference will be loaded regardless of the audio language.
AndroidUnlockRestoreHelp: To restore your previous purchase, please ensure you're signed into the device with the same Google (or Amazon) account that originally made the purchase. Make sure the app store is enabled and not restricted by any parental controls, and ensure you have an active internet connection. You'll only have to do this once to restore your previous purchase.
AutomaticallyConvertNewContentHelp: Nový obsah pridaný do tohto priečinka bude automaticky skonvertovaný.
AutomaticallySyncNewContentHelp: New content added to this folder will be automatically downloaded to the device.
BurnSubtitlesHelp: Determines if the server should burn in subtitles when converting video depending on the subtitles format. Avoiding burning in subtitles will improve server performance. Select Auto to burn image based formats (e.g. VOBSUB, PGS, SUB/IDX, etc.) as well as certain ASS/SSA subtitles
CinemaModeConfigurationHelp: Cinema mode brings the theater experience straight to your living room with the ability to play trailers and custom intros before the main feature.
CinemaModeFeatureDescription: Cinema Mode gives you the true cinema experience with trailers and custom intros before the feature.
CloudSyncFeatureDescription: Sync your media to the cloud for easy backup, archiving, and converting.
ConfigureDateAdded: Configure how date added is determined in the Veso Server dashboard under Library settings
ConfirmDeleteItem: Deleting this item will delete it from both the file system and your media library. Are you sure you wish to continue?
ConfirmDeleteItems: Deleting these items will delete them from both the file system and your media library. Are you sure you wish to continue?
ConvertItemLimitHelp: Voliteľné. Nastaviť limit položiek, ktoré budú konvertované.
ConvertUnwatchedVideosOnlyHelp: Only unwatched videos will be converted.
DefaultErrorMessage: Pri spracúvaní požiadavky došlo k chybe. Skúste prosím neskôr znova.
DefaultSubtitlesHelp: Subtitles are loaded based on the default and forced flags in the embedded metadata. Language preferences are considered when multiple options are available.
DirectStreamHelp1: The media is compatible with the device regarding resolution and media type (H.264, AC3, etc.), but is in an incompatible file container (.mkv, .avi, .wmv, etc.). The video will be re-packaged on the fly before streaming it to the device.
DirectStreamHelp2: Direct Streaming a file uses very little processing power without any loss in video quality.
DisplayInOtherHomeScreenSections: Display in home screen sections such as latest media and continue watching
DisplayMissingEpisodesWithinSeasons: Zobraziť chýbajúce epizódy v rámci sezóny.
DisplayMissingEpisodesWithinSeasonsHelp: This must also be enabled for TV libraries in Veso Server setup.
DisplayModeHelp: Select the type of screen you're running Veso on.
DownloadItemLimitHelp: Voliteľné. Nastaviť limit položiek, ktoré budú stiahnuté.
DvrFeatureDescription: Schedule individual Live TV recordings, series recordings, and more with Veso DVR.
DvrSubscriptionRequired: Veso DVR requires an active Veso Premiere subscription.
EnableBackdropsHelp: If enabled, backdrops will be displayed in the background of some pages while browsing the library.
EnableExternalVideoPlayersHelp: An external player menu will be shown when starting video playback.
EnableNextVideoInfoOverlay: Enable next video info during playback
EnableNextVideoInfoOverlayHelp: At the end of a video, display info about the next video coming up in the current playlist.
EnableThemeSongsHelp: If enabled, theme songs will be played in the background while browsing the library.
EnableThemeVideosHelp: If enabled, theme videos will be played in the background while browsing the library.
ErrorAddingGuestAccount1: There was an error adding the Veso Connect account. Has your guest created an Veso account? They can sign up at {0}.
ErrorAddingGuestAccount2: If you're still having an issue, please send an email to {0}, and include your email address as well as theirs.
ErrorAddingVesoConnectAccount1: There was an error adding the Veso Connect account. Have you created an Veso account? Sign up at {0}.
ErrorAddingVesoConnectAccount2: If you're still having an issue, please send an email to {0} from the email address used with the Veso account.
ErrorConnectServerUnreachable: There was an error performing the requested operation. Your server is unable to contact our Veso Connect Server at {0}. Please ensure your server has an active internet connection and that the communications are being allowed by any firewall or security software you have installed.
ErrorDeletingItem: There was an error deleting the item from Veso Server. Please check that Veso Server has write access to the media folder and try again.
ErrorReachingVesoConnect: There was an error reaching the Veso Connect server. Please ensure you have an active internet connection and try again.
ErrorRemovingVesoConnectAccount: There was an error removing the Veso Connect account. Please ensure you have an active internet connection and try again.
FeatureRequiresVesoPremiere: Táto funkcia vyžaduje aktívne predplatné Veso Premiere.
FreeAppsFeatureDescription: Enjoy free access to Veso apps for your devices.
GuestUserNotFound: User not found. Please ensure the name is correct and try again, or try entering their email address.
HeaderEnabledFieldsHelp: Uncheck a field to lock it and prevent its data from being changed.
HeaderIdentifyItemHelp: Zadajte jedno alebo viacero kritérií. Odstránenie kritéria zvýši počet výsledkov.
HeaderOfflineDownloadsDescription: Download media to your devices for easy offline use.
HeaderSyncRequiresSub: Downloading requires an active Veso Premiere subscription.
HideWatchedContentFromLatestMedia: Hide watched content from latest media
LabelDisplayLanguageHelp: Translating Veso is an ongoing project.
LabelDropImageHere: Drop image here, or click to browse.
LabelLockItemToPreventChanges: Lock this item to prevent future changes
LabelPlayDefaultAudioTrack: Prehrať predvolenú zvukovú stopu bez ohľadu na jazyk
LabelSelectFolderGroups: Automatically group content from the following folders into views such as Movies, Music and TV:
LabelSelectFolderGroupsHelp: Folders that are unchecked will be displayed by themselves in their own view.
LabelSyncNoTargetsHelp: It looks like you don't currently have any apps that support offline downloading.
LiveTvFeatureDescription: Stream Live TV to any Veso app, with a compatible TV tuner device installed on your Veso Server.
LiveTvRequiresUnlock: Živá TV vyžaduje aktívne predplatné Veso Premiere.
MediaIsBeingConverted: The media is being converted into a format that is compatible with the device that is playing the media.
MessageActiveSubscriptionRequiredSeriesR: An active Veso Premiere subscription is required in order to create automated series recordings.
MessageAreYouSureDeleteSubtitles: Ste si istý, že chcete zmazať súbor s titulkami?
MessageFileReadError: There was an error reading the file. Please try again.
MessageIfYouBlockedVoice: If you denied voice access to the app you'll need to reconfigure before trying again.
MessageImageFileTypeAllowed: Only JPEG and PNG files are supported.
MessageImageTypeNotSelected: Please select an image type from the drop-down menu.
MessageInvitationSentToNewUser: An email has been sent to {0} inviting them to sign up with Veso.
MessageInvitationSentToUser: An email has been sent to {0}, inviting them to accept your sharing invitation.
MessageVesoAccontRemoved: The Veso account has been removed from this user.
MessageVesoAccountAdded: The Veso account has been added to this user.
MessageLeaveEmptyToInherit: Leave empty to inherit settings from a parent item, or the global default value.
MessageNoDownloadsFound: No offline downloads. Download your media for offline use by clicking Download throughout the app.
MessageNoServersAvailableToConnect: No servers are available to connect to. If you've been invited to share a server, make sure to accept it below or by clicking the link in the email.
MessageNoSyncJobsFound: No downloads found. Create download jobs using the Download buttons found throughout the app.
MessagePendingVesoAccountAdded: The Veso account has been added to this user. An email will be sent to the owner of the account. The invitation will need to be confirmed by clicking a link within the email.
MessagePlayAccessRestricted: Playback of this content is currently restricted. Please contact your Veso Server administrator for more information.
MessageToValidateSupporter: If you have an active Veso Premiere subscription, ensure you've setup Veso Premiere in your Veso Server Dashboard, which you can access by clicking Veso Premiere within the main menu.
MessageUnlockAppWithPurchaseOrSupporter: Unlock this feature with a small one-time purchase, or with an active Veso Premiere subscription.
MessageUnlockAppWithSupporter: Unlock this feature with an active Veso Premiere subscription.
MessageWeDidntRecognizeCommand: We're sorry, we didn't recognize that command.
Name: Meno
NewCollectionHelp: Collections allow you to create personalized groupings of movies and other library content.
NoSubtitlesHelp: Subtitles will not be loaded by default. They can still be turned on manually during playback.
OnlyForcedSubtitlesHelp: Budú zobrazené iba titulky označené ako vynútené.
OnlyImageFormats: Only image formats (VOBSUB, PGS, SUB/IDX, etc.)
PlaybackErrorNoCompatibleStream: No compatible streams are currently available. Please try again later or contact your system administrator for details.
PlaybackErrorNotAllowed: You're currently not authorized to play this content. Please contact your system administrator for details.
PlaybackErrorPlaceHolder: Please insert the disc in order to play this video.
PlaybackSettingsIntro: To configure default playback settings, stop video playback, then click your user icon in the top right section of the app.
PleaseEnterNameOrId: Zadajte meno alebo externé ID prosím.
PleaseSelectDeviceToSyncTo: Please select a device to download to.
PromoConvertRecordingsToStreamingFormat: Automatically convert recordings to a streaming friendly format with Veso Premiere. Recordings will be converted on the fly to MP4 or MKV, based on Veso server settings.
RefFramesNotSupported: Number of video reference frames not supported
RefreshDialogHelp: Metadata is refreshed based on settings and internet services that are enabled in the Veso Server dashboard.
RestartPleaseWaitMessage: Počkajte prosím kým sa Veso Server vypne a znova naštartuje. Môže to trvať minútu alebo dve.
SearchForCollectionInternetMetadata: Vyhľadať metadáta a obrázky na Internete.
SeriesDisplayOrderHelp: Order episodes by air date, dvd order, or absolute numbering.
ServerUpdateNeeded: Tento Veso server treba aktualizovať. Najnovšiu verziu nájdete na {0}
SkipEpisodesAlreadyInMyLibrary: Nenahrávať epizódy, ktoré už sú v mojej knižnici
SkipEpisodesAlreadyInMyLibraryHelp: Episodes will be compared using season and episode numbers, when available.
SmartSubtitlesHelp: Subtitles matching the language preference will be loaded when the audio is in a foreign language.
SubtitleAppearanceSettingsAlsoPassedToCa: These settings also apply to any Chromecast playback started by this device.
SubtitleAppearanceSettingsDisclaimer: These settings will not apply to graphical subtitles (PGS, DVD, etc), or subtitles that have their own styles embedded (ASS/SSA).
SubtitleSettingsIntro: To configure default subtitle appearance and language settings, stop video playback, then click your user icon in the top right section of the app.
SyncUnwatchedVideosOnlyHelp: Only unwatched videos will be downloaded, and videos will be removed from the device as they are watched.
ThankYouForTryingEnjoyOneMinute: Please enjoy one minute of playback. Thank you for trying Veso.
TheseSettingsAffectSubtitlesOnThisDevice: These settings affect subtitles on this device
TryMultiSelectMessage: To edit multiple media items, just click and hold any poster and select the items you want to manage. Try it!
WifiRequiredToDownload: A Wifi connection is required to continue downloading.
